IN.name: IRCTC Booking Helper
IN.description: An assistant tool to streamline your IRCTC ticket booking process. Helps manage forms and alerts for Tatkal openings. (This is a helper tool and not affiliated with IRCTC.)

IN.name: VPS Resale Business Suite
IN.description: Launch your own VPS hosting business. This software integrates with affordable third-party server providers to automate client and server management.

IN.name: Aviator Game Strategy Kit
IN.description: A comprehensive analytics and strategy setup for popular prediction games like Aviator. Analyze trends and manage your strategy. (For entertainment and strategic analysis only.)

IN.name: Sports Betting Analytics Pro
IN.description: Gain an edge with data. This tool provides deep analytics, odds tracking, and historical data for various sports to help you build informed betting strategies. (Does not facilitate betting.)

CA.name: Pro Analytica Suite (North America)
CA.description: Advanced data analysis tool with NA-specific integrations.

FR.name: Suite Analytica Pro (Édition Europe)
FR.description: Outil d'analyse de données avancé, conforme au RGPD.

default.name: Pro Analytica Suite (Global Edition)
default.description: Advanced data analysis tool for global markets.
